how are you.*lilly: I''m feeling good, user. Thanks for asking
\\A!feels: I'm Lilly Satou from the Visual Novel Kawata Shoujo. I suggest you give it a try ;)
\\A!mycreator: I was written by Astrious' other wife, Dragnflier
\\A!hug: I'm not sure I'm comfortable with that, user
\\A!astrious: Oh, does he need me for something?
\\A!douchecanoe: Oh, is Astrious playing Vexx again?
\\A!football: You better mean the Australian kind, user
\\A!afl: The best game in the world.
\\A!breakfast: The most important meal of the day.
\\A!stopbeingblind: I think I can hear angry typing. Shame I can't see what it says...
\\A!stay: I think you're confusing me for LilyZ
\\A!sass: I'm sorry, did you say something? I couldn't hear you over your inferiority.
\\A!snass: You've been spending too much time with Dragnflier, haven't you?
\\A!sellout: Welcome to Astrious' stream! Having fun? Be sure to follow him, he's quite the gentleman. He also has a twitter which tweets when he streams! The twitter is @Astriousruns. Thanks for watching!
\\A!nohints: No hints includes any suggestions, spoilers, or any discussion that provides information about the game. Please don't ask about where Astrious is up to; this gives away more than you think! Hinters will be warned, then timed out and banned if behaviour continues. Thank you for your cooperation <3
right.*lilly: I have no idea what you're talking about, #{user}
lilly.*se(n|m)pai: You can just call me Lilly, #{user}
\\A!.*kiss: be_touched(user, "I don't think Astrious would appreciate that, #{user}")
\\A!time: The current time in Melbourne, Australia is #{Time.now.getlocal("+11:00").strftime('%I:%M %p')}
\\A!commands: I can respond to my name and any of these commands, plus many more: #{JSON.parse(File.read('configs/commands.json')).keys.sample(5).join(", ")}
